docblock.description: A Compatibility library with PHP 5.5's simplified password hashing API.
docblock.long-description: Adapt to use SHA512 for old PHP version (PHP 5.3.0 >= v <= PHP 5.3.7)

docblock.description: Hash the password using the specified algorithm

tag.name: param
tag.description: The algorithm to use (Defined by PASSWORD_* constants)

tag.name: param
tag.description: The options for the algorithm to use

tag.name: returns
tag.description: string|false The hashed password, or false on error.

docblock.description: Get information about the password hash. Returns an array of the information that was used to generate the password hash.
docblock.long-description: array( 'algo' => 1, 'algoName' => 'bcrypt', 'options' => array( 'cost' => 10, ), )

tag.name: param
tag.description: The password hash to extract info from

tag.name: return
tag.description: The array of information about the hash.

docblock.description: Determine if the password hash needs to be rehashed according to the options provided
docblock.long-description: If the answer is true, after validating the password using password_verify, rehash it.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The algorithm used for new password hashes

tag.name: param
tag.description: The options array passed to password_hash

tag.name: return
tag.description: True if the password needs to be rehashed.

docblock.description: Verify a password against a hash using a timing attack resistant approach

tag.name: return
tag.description: If the password matches the hash
